summary: Consume Mailchimp API to perform operations such as managing members, campaigns, and list groups.

parameters.name: authentication
parameters.description: Select the type of authentication to use (API Key or OAuth2).

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Choose the type of resource to perform operations on (Campaign, List Group, Member, Member Tag, or Custom API Call).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the operation to perform on the chosen resource (e.g., Create, Delete, Get, Update).
